import React from 'react' import logo from './logo.svg' import './App.css' import * as d3 from 'd3' const data = [ { time: 'At open', items: 24 }, { time: '11:00 PM', items: 0 }, ] class App extends React.Component { drawLineChart(data) { const svgWidth = 800 const svgHeight = 400 const svg = d3 .select('svg') .attr('width', svgWidth) .attr('height', svgHeight) const margin = { top: 20, right: 20, bottom: 30, left: 50 } const g = svg.append('g').append('transform', 'translate(' + margin.left + ',' + margin.top + ')') } render() { return (
